title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: The position of Cybersecurity Analyst requires at least 3 years of experience in threat analysis, vulnerability assessments, and intrusion detection. Familiarity with cybersecurity tools such as Kali Linux, Wireshark, and Metasploit is essential. A Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or Information Security is required. Candidates with 'Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)' or 'CISSP' certification will be given preference.
